title: LG 126 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart TV  (50UP7500PTZ)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV, User Manual, Warranty Card, Remote Control, 2 Cards, 2 Batteries
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: WMV, ASF, AVI, MP4, M4V, MOV, MPG, MPEG, MKV, MPEG, DAT, MTS, TS, TP, TRP, DIVX, MKV, RM
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar, Apple TV, SonyLIV, Discovery+, Zee5, Voot, Google Play Movies and TV, YuppTV, Youtube, Eros Now
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Comprehensive Warranty and Additional 1 Year Warranty is Applicable on Panel only. (Offer valid till 30 - April - 2022)
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Ultimate 4K Viewing: Enjoy lifelike images and dynamic colours on the LG UHD TV, which offers high pixel accuracy. So, whether you’re watching a movie, a cricket match, or you’re playing a game, this TV gives you a larger-than-life viewing experience.
product_description.Filmmaker Mode with HDR: With this TV, you can bring a movie theatre experience into your own home. With features such as Filmmaker Mode and HDR, this TV immerses you in its high-quality visuals. You can also connect with varied streaming services to have access to your favourite entertainment.

review: Colour production is good , motion interpolation is perfect . It is va panel for 43 inch tv viewing angle is good, not ips as in description , sound quality is good, Contrast ratio is actually ok and at times black looks like grey .

There is difference in opinion about its panel type. Whether it is VA or IPS? LG has not yet revealed about panel type. Viewing angle is not like 178 deg. Magic remote has not been provided thats why we cannot use Alexa and Google voice assistant. You have to purchase magic remote. We can give voice commands through LG thinq app downloaded in your smart phone but voice recognition is very poor. Compatible magic remote for TV model is not available in India. Be carefull while purchasing remote for this TV.
Only one usb port is there you cannot attach two usb devices at a time. Customer care executives are aware of whether this TV support USB hub or not.
Internal storage and Ram is less compared other android TV of even lesser price.
Picture quality and sound both are very good for the price. Screen mirroring works great. Using jiofi 4g hotspot for steaming zee5 and sony LIV app and it works fantastic so far provided network speed is good in your area.

I have looked for various brands and researched extensively before buying this tv. In short, for people looking for other options, this lg tv beats all other brands like hisense, mi, sansui, kodak, vu, blaunkpunkt, motorola, nokia, thomson etc. I have seen some of the tvs above mentioned by naked eye and no one comes close to this. Other brands boast of extensive features, but as they say they are all "jack of all trades, but master of none". Trust me, hdr on this tv is better than dolby vision on hisense. Only tvs that beat this are Sony and other lg, samsung oled tvs. So heres my experience after 10 days of use:

Pros:
1. 4k clarity is really good. No complaints here. Works perfect.
2. Upscaling is really good. SD and HD channels on set top box look clear and nice.
3. Hdr works perfectly in prime video and netflix. No issues here (but you need to play with settings to acheive best of it)
4. Has filmmaker mode, one of the best features, shows picture as is without any extra additions.
5. App support is good. Bluetooth connectivity and network connectivity are fine, havent faced any issues.

Cons:
1. The biggest con i would say for this tv is sound. It has 20w speaker, enough for a small room but not good enough for a big hall. Better buy a soundbar in that case.
2. No magic remote, also couldnt get the magic remote app in playstore to work.
3. LG installation and service are okay. Not upto the mark.
4. Viewing angles are fine. I feel its VA panel, but viewing angles are not as bad as others. Unless you go to extreme sides, there may not be a problem. But hope lg would have provided IPS, which is LG is known for.

Overall, Good tv. Go for it. If sound is your number one priority, "AVOID" this tv, youll surely be dissapointed.

Bought in Big Billion Sale and got the tv within 7 days. Good delivery by flipkart on those busy days.
Coming to LG TV, we were using LG 32 inch tv for last 5 yrs and this was an upgrade. TV is quite nice. WebOS is functional. Easy to use. This does not have a magic remote but I don't think we need that as it have LG thinq app which does it better than remote.
Video quality is great as expected.
Sound quality is more than what we expected. It's ability to pair with Bluetooth speakers and through aux is good. Bluetooth have some lag so not recommended for gaming.
Casting using phone is easy just like a chrome cast.

The wall mount which is available free from LG service is good. It's adjustable side ways and back and forth, which is quite useful.

Using it for over 7 days. It has amazing picture quality, sound is good thanks to AI mode, low boot up time, connectivity with Bluetooth and WiFi works great, supports all famous OTT apps and best part is it’s support to IPhone.
Just go for it!
Thanks to flipkart for delivery in one day and installation done on same day.
The TV is perfect with awesome picture quality and vivid sound quality...... A good purchase indeed with on time delivery and installation...... Thanks Flipkart for the wonderful product.
Quick delivery and installation picture clarity is good value for money worth product thank you Flipkart

Real vallue for money considering the various features and hi end software support like eArc etc within the given price point. What's missing is the magic remote which I believe should have been provided. No mention by LG about panel type ( IPS or VA ) but over all I'm satisfied with my purchase.

Magic remote should have been given in the Box Instead of basic remote, LG should have installed android Instead of web os , aslo connectivity with my Sony home theatre is not good through ARC, sometimes I need to restart both the home theatre and tv for detection,
55 inch has IPS panel and it's best, 43 and 50 inch have VA panel (confirmed from LG service center) got 55inch at unbelievable price 44 k during big billion days

After one month of usage I can say display is best ,my opinion is...

Sound and picture quality is excellent. Do not compare it with chaines brand and not go for less rating. Sound is crystal clear and enough for domestic use. Overall this TV is very good. One thing is to be noted that screen contrast and sharpness is more better than chaines products and screen life of chaines products are becoming faint after use 4-5 year I feel it in MI TV. Just concept of led bulb that 6 month use its light become lesser than compare new one.
Installation part is poor and I think local service centre who brings wall mount bracket (not provided in TV box) is wrost product because there is two type of wall mount instruments one is moving in all directions with for and ahead also buy I have provided with moving left and right only. I call to customer care also and he replied me kindly raise issue with local service provider. Demo part is also poor it seems he has not time and he just came for TV installation. LG has to look into matter.

Great experience. Wonderful picture quality and good sound quality. No issue with grey uniformity. Good viewing angles. Good upscaling capability of tv. Natural colors. And use expert mode for less strain to eyes!
Am not get in this pack magic remote ,their response not good and my refund amount not been received till date don't buy in online .In this product available magic remote but they given normal one

Very nice product. But comes without magic remote. I am still in a dilemma that i will get magic remote to purchase separately or not. Local LG service centre doesn't have stock, even said this model is not compatible with magic remote. Flipkart customer care doesn't know about it. LG customer care is confirming that magic remote will work. So am still confused. Otherwise product is amazing.
Rest everything is good except magic remote is not available with this model and Tv panel is not IPA. sound quality is best.

Nice Smart TV must purchase. It's my first smart TV and I checked each & everything working fine as of now. Screencast working smoothly. You can make your smartphone your magic remote for this Smart TV. Overall I liked it and thanks to LG for keeping the trust.
Very nice picture and sound qualitied. WebOS is not upto the mark, very clumsy, needs to simplify like Android and need to add frequently used apps like JioTV

I would not say that the TV is best but if you’re looking for a budget TV.. go for it. The 4k and HD quality is good and you will enjoy it. Sound is obviously not you can expect to the level of Sony but ok. Connect it from your BT speaker and enjoy. The delivery and installation was super fast. The same was done within 12 hours of my placing the request.

Superb picture quality and web os software is quite good and much improved.
Ultra HD 4k video clarity is awesome and it's quite clear that LG is best in technology. The only area where LG need to improve is sound quality. I can say sound quality is good but not that much great. Anyway a superb TV which is absolutely value for money
Magic remote should have been part of purchased item. Otherwise i am very much satisfied in other aspects. Well built and good picture quality tv.

It's an amazing Tv in 55inch segment and coming to the LG brand just go for it without any hesitation and don't compare with other brands and no other brands give great customer service like LG.

Thanks to Flipkart and seller

Delivery was on time

TV was installed on time but installed on fixed wall mount and we can not move the tv to access various ports which are on the back. We have to unmount the tv every time to access the port which is risky. LG should provide installation on flexible wall mount for TV's which have ports on the back.

Software response is slow. It takes about 6-10 seconds even to open settings after pressing the button on remote.
Smart TV without a voice command remote again disappoints. Such very basic function should not be compromised for cost cutting.

But overall satisfied with the brand for providing 50" this tv at lowest possible price.I purchased it at 45K after discounts and offers.

Overall it is a good TV witn IPS panel. Picture quality is good. Sound is good. A very good buy in this price.
Life's Good

I bought it during sale for my bedroom. I already have a 55 inch samsung 8 series tv so i will compare with it on some points.
Cons:
1. Remote quality is not good. Although it works fine but the buttons feel very cheap and distinction between buttons are not good.
2. Hotstar does not support 4k
3. NO DOLBY VISION
4.Only 2 usb ports
5.Medium bezel design although it looks good
6. Colour washout is little kore than my samsung tv which has same va panel but for a room that is acceptable

Pros
There are many pros and these overshadows cons by far
1. Awesome picture quality. Much better than those budget brands like vu and mi. I looked at those tv at stores and this tv had much better colour.picture quality is even slightly better than my samsung tv
2. Motion blur control is very good on this tv. While watching cricket it is pretty evident. Its much better than samsung
3. Aound quality is very good for small room. I hardly play it above 20. Might be little less for a hall.
4. Best part is webos of lg. Its very well optimised ans very fast. Much better than tizen os of samaung and definitely better than laggy android. With the thinQ app of lg you can even use your phone as remote. Apple airplay worls flawlessly and without lag. App opening is super fast and it supports 5Ghz wifi too.
5. Colour profile presets are very good. Flimmaker mode looks awesome on ott contents.
6. Playing content from pen drives is very smooth and with very good upscaling
Happy customer by use of one month

Picture quality is excellent
Colors ar natural and not so vibrant. Color temperature is really controlled well.
Settings of audio and video has several modes of your choice. I really soke the cinema mode audio. It creates very lod and clear sounds for movies and music.
Speakers are so loud that you might not need home theatre.

I tried it with Wifi connecting to Airtel Xtreme fiber. It runs buttery smooth.

Also I tried it with HD channels on Airtel DTH. The quality of picture and audio is excellent.

Cons:
SD channels are waste of money. Don't even try to watch SD channels on 50+ inch tv.

Internal memory 2.5GB Only(App store)
